QueryResult.text: SELECT O.ID, NLS.LANGUAGE_CODE, NLS.NAME, NLS.DESCRIPTION, O.OBJECT_CODE, L.LOOKUP_CODE OBJECT_TYPE, O.COMPONENT_ID, O.IS_ACTIVE, O.IS_SYSTEM, O.CREATED_DATE, O.CREATED_BY, O.LAST_UPDATED_DATE, O.LAST_UPDATED_BY FROM CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS NLS, CMN_SEC_OBJECTS O, CMN_LOOKUPS L WHERE NLS.TABLE_NAME = 'CMN_SEC_OBJECTS' AND NLS.PK_ID = O.ID AND L.LOOKUP_TYPE = 'SEC_OBJECT_TYPE' AND L.ID = O.OBJECT_TYPE_ID
